Project Briefing
Work Flow Automation:
This project provides a good solution for Office automation by allowing organizations
to handle their employee details easily. The administrator can track the daily work of the
employee, the manager can assign the work and the employees can view their work. Apart
from improving the speed and accuracy it also increases transparency in the organization.

Was an active member in organizing a national seminar on “ Emerging trends in

Secured a percentile score of 83.6 in GATE 2008.Participated  in  National  conference  on  “ Information  Technology  and  Higher
